title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 521.14 - Separability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 521.14 - Separability

State Regulations

If any section, paragraph or provision of this Part shall be
adjudged by any court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid, such judgment
shall not affect, impair or invalidate the remainder thereof but shall be
confined in its operation to the section, paragraph or provision thereof
directly involved in the controversy in which such judgment has been
rendered. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
521.14

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
